attributes.action: All convicted rioters, irrespective of age, should be 'tagged' and subject to a dusk to dawn curfew.
attributes.additional_details: Everyone convicted of an offence connected with the recent riots, irrespective of age, should be electronically tagged and subject to a dusk to dawn curfew.  This (tagging) should apply for a period of not less than 6 months and, in the case of individuals given a custodial sentence, it should apply from the date of their release.
